title: How to use the Extends and Include Django Template Tags
content: When to use Django extends vs. Django include. Choosing whether to extend or include a template comes down to the purpose of the file. In general, extend a file to use its code as a base for multiple templates and include a file to load a single section of code within the context of another template. This may seem confusing at first but learning how to extend a template in Django and include a ...
